title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Competencies: Social-Emotional Learning Design Based on Augmented Reality for Learners with Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Educational Knowledge and Understanding of Learning Disabilities
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Social-emotional needs of students with learning disabilities can be analyzed and assessed in AR-based simulation environments
AR interaction scenarios for students with learning disabilities can be developed by applying User-Centered Design (UCD) principles
Assessment tools measuring learners' emotional responses in augmented reality environments can be designed and utilized
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
